description.value:
These brown leather shoes have surprisingly thick soles, as though a cobbler had recently repaired them. The tan laces always pull to exactly the right tautness for your feet and ankles to feel supported. You can perform the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hustle] exploration mode activity for twice as many minutes as normal, equal to your Constitution modifier × 20 (minimum 20).

Activate—Big Step 1 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The soles on your boots grow even thicker for a moment, proving a bounce to your step. You Step twice.
